scripts.scriptdata:
#!/static/bin/ash
#lesslinux provides iw
PATH=/bin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:/static/bin:/static/sbin export PATH LC_ALL=C export LC_ALL
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams . /etc/rc.subr/colors [ -f /etc/rc.defaults.override ] && . /etc/rc.defaults.override
# Set regulatory domain case $1 in start) if [ -n "$regdom" ] ; then printf "$bold===> Setting regulatory domain to $regdom $normal\n" iw reg set "$regdom" fi ;; esac #
